p: Ethyl acetate, n-Hexane (Loba Chemie PVT. LTD), ketamine hydrochloride (Neon Laboratories Limited, India), methanol (Carlo Erba Reagents S.A.S), cyclophosphamide injection IP (Cadila Healthcare Limited, India), formalin 10% (Sheba pharmaceuticals PLC, Ethiopia), normal saline (Addis Pharmaceutical Factory, Ethiopia), distilled water (Jourilabs, Ethiopia) were used. All other chemicals used were also of analytical grade.
